help-file.title: "ELEMENTAL FURY"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Elemental
"Elemental Fury" calls down the power of the elemental planes upon the Shaman's enemies. Anyone in the area not allied with the caster will suffer the onslaught of earth, ice and burning air.
